snippet: The former N.F.L. safety Darren Sharper entered a formal plea of not guilty before a federal magistrate judge in New Orleans, but that was considered a legal formality.
abstract: Former NFL safety Darren Sharper enters formal plea of not guilty to sexual assault charges in New Orleans following multijurisdictional plea agreement; other football news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and TOM PEDULLA

lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. safety Darren Sharper entered a formal plea of not guilty before a federal magistrate judge in New Orleans, but that was considered a legal formality.

headline.main: Darren Sharper’s Case Advances in New Orleans Court
headline.print_headline: Sharper’s Case Advances in New Orleans Court
